table.name: vtiger_languages
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vtiger_languages ( languageid int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, prefix varchar(5) NOT NULL, encoding varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UTF-8', language varchar(255) NOT NULL, version varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, author varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, license text, createddate timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, date_modified timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', lockfor int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (languageid) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=5 ;

table.name: sqlcomand
table.sql:
INSERT INTO vtiger_languages (languageid, prefix, encoding, language, version, author, license, createddate, date_modified, lockfor) VALUES
